overview: This film has been made with exclusively manual means. The 13,832 frames of the film have been manipulated by the author, frame by frame, using all kinds of procedures: oil, inks, markers, lacquers, perforators, punches, scrapers, sandpaper, letter sets, decals, adhesives, sprayers, etc, etc. with the intention of completing the multiple possibilities offered by manual work on celluloid.
title: Underwelles
